summary: Private-sector developers and property management companies build, renovate, maintain, and repair about 99% of family housing at military bases in the United States. However, with reports of hazards like mold, lead-based paint, and pest infestations, there are concerns about how well DOD monitors the condition of privatized military housing. We testified about our preliminary observations from ongoing work in this area. Specifically, military departments are...
title: Military Housing Privatization: Preliminary Observations on DOD's Oversight of the Condition of Privatized Military Housing
